name: videoSource
longDescription: Source for video. UDP, TCP, RTSP and UVC Cameras may be supported depending on Vehicle and ground station version.

name: videoSource2
longDescription: Source for video 2. UDP, TCP, RTSP and UVC Cameras may be supported depending on Vehicle and ground station version.

name: videoSource3
longDescription: Source for video 3. UDP, TCP, RTSP and UVC Cameras may be supported depending on Vehicle and ground station version.

name: videoSource4
longDescription: Source for video 4. UDP, TCP, RTSP and UVC Cameras may be supported depending on Vehicle and ground station version.

name: udpPort
longDescription: UDP port to bind to for video stream.

name: rtspUrl
longDescription: RTSP url address and port to bind to for video stream. Example: rtsp://192.168.42.1:554/live

name: rtspUrl2
longDescription: RTSP url address and port to bind to for video stream 2. Example: rtsp://192.168.42.1:554/live

name: rtspUrl3
longDescription: RTSP url address and port to bind to for video stream 3. Example: rtsp://192.168.42.1:554/live

name: rtspUrl4
longDescription: RTSP url address and port to bind to for video stream 4. Example: rtsp://192.168.42.1:554/live

name: tcpUrl
longDescription: TCP url address and port to bind to for video stream. Example: 192.168.143.200:3001

name: videoSavePath
longDescription: Directory to save videos to.

name: aspectRatio
longDescription: Video Aspect Ratio (width / height). Use 0.0 to ignore it.

name: gridLines
longDescription: Displays a grid overlaid over the video view.

name: videoFit
longDescription: Handle Video Aspect Ratio.

name: showRecControl
longDescription: Show recording control in the UI.

name: recordingFormat
longDescription: Video recording file format.

name: maxVideoSize
longDescription: Maximum amount of disk space used by video recording.

name: enableStorageLimit
longDescription: When enabled, old video files will be auto-deleted when the total size of QGC-recorded video exceeds the maximum video storage usage.

name: rtspTimeout
longDescription: How long to wait before assuming RTSP link is gone.

name: streamEnabled
longDescription: Start/Stop Video Stream.

name: disableWhenDisarmed
longDescription: Disable Video Stream when disarmed.

name: lowLatencyMode
longDescription: If this option is enabled, the rtpjitterbuffer is removed and the video sink is set to assynchronous mode, reducing the latency by about 200 ms.

name: forceVideoDecoder
shortDescription: Force specific category of video decode
longDescription: Force the change of prioritization between video decode methods, allowing the user to force some video hardware decode plugins if necessary.
enumStrings: Default,Force software decoder,Force NVIDIA decoder,Force VA-API decoder,Force DirectX3D 11 decoder,Force VideoToolbox decoder
